text: A heavy-lift launch vehicle (HLV) is an orbital launch vehicle that could lift payloads between into low Earth orbit (LEO).NASA Space Technology Roadmaps â€“ Launch Propulsion Systems, p.11 : "Small: 0-2t payloads, Medium: 2-20t payloads, Heavy: 20-50t payloads, Super Heavy: >50t payloads" ==References== Category:Spacecraft
title: Heavy-lift launch vehicle
